content: Install required backend dependencies (httpx for gateway API calls, APScheduler for scheduling)
Install required frontend dependencies (lucide-react, framer-motion, sonner, date-fns, @tiptap/react, @tiptap/starter-kit, react-dropzone)
Set up shadcn/ui components (Button, Input, Textarea, Select, Badge, Tabs, Table, Dialog, Sheet, Calendar, Tooltip) as .js files
Create backend WhatsApp gateway client utility with send_message and send_image functions
Add backend debug route /api/debug/send for testing gateway integration
Test gateway with text message to test phone (6281290080025)
Test gateway with image message to test phone
